comments.author: Guido Millenaar, NKI-AvL
comments.description: WADQC 2 module for use with ACR MR phantom acquisitions

params.datetime_series_description: REQUIRED. Series description for retreiving datetime
params.resonance_frequency_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining the resonance frequency.
params.snr_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining the signal to noise ratio.
params.snr_signal_roi_diameter_mm: Diameter in millimeters for the centered roi that is used for measuring signal.
params.snr_noise_roi_sides_mm: Side length in millimeters of the square rois that are used for measuring noise.
params.ghosting_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining ghosting.
params.ghosting_roi_width_mm: Width in millimeters of the roi used for measuring ghosting signal.
params.ghosting_roi_height_mm: Height in millimeters of the roi used for measuring ghosting signal.
params.image_uniformity_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining image uniformity.
params.geometry_x_y_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining phantom geometry over x and y axes.
params.geometry_z_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining phantom geometry over z axis.
params.shim_series_description: REQUIRED. The series description that identifies the correct acquisition for determining shim.
params.shim_B0_map_type: REQUIRED. Type of map supplied by the scanner. Options: 'Philips Double Echo FFE'
params.shim_relative_roi_size: REQUIRED. Size of the ROI radius used for measuring the B0 values. Percentage of the phantom size.
params.shim_top_margin: REQUIRED. Percentage of the ROI diameter which is vertically removed from the top to account for the air bubble in the phantom.
params.rf_transmitter_amplitude_tag: REQUIRED. Specify the header tag that holds the transmitter amplitude. List of two hexadecimal strings of length 6, e.g ['0x0008', '0x014A']
params.rf_transmitter_series_description: REQUIRED. Series description to use when looking up the transmitter amplitude
